unnormalised: ## Flash Sales: Grab 'Em Before They're Gone, Yaar!
normalised: ## Flash Sales: Grab 'Em Before They're Gone, Yaar!

unnormalised: Ever been scrolling through your phone and BAM! A ridiculously good deal pops up? That, my friends, is the magic of a flash sale. In the crazy world of retail and e-commerce, these super-short, highly-discounted sales are designed to get your heart racing and your credit card twitching. Think of it like this: it's the online shopping equivalent of finding an auto rickshaw willing to take you from Bandra to Churchgate for just Rs. 50! Unheard of, right?

Think of it like this: it's the online shopping equivalent of finding an auto rickshaw willing to take you from Bandra to Churchgate for just rupees fifty! Unheard of, right?

unnormalised: But why do companies like Flipkart and Myntra run these flash sales? Well, several reasons. Firstly, they're AMAZING for clearing out old stock. Maybe they have a mountain of kurtis from last Diwali's collection that need a new home. A flash sale gets them moving faster than you can say "Paneer Butter Masala"!

unnormalised: Secondly, it creates a real buzz. People talk about them, share them on WhatsApp groups (you know you have that one family group!), and even set reminders! The fear of missing out (FOMO) is strong, especially when it comes to things like ethnic wear around Onam. Imagine missing out on a silk saree for your auntie at half price! Crisis averted, thanks to the flash sale.
